name: SpinOn
description:
An old game of mine, created as my first project in Unity. You control a wooden ball, and your goal is to collect all the coins and reach the finish point.

There are 4 levels. If you're stuck at some level, feel free to edit the save.dat file.

Have fun!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows - rotate the ball
  • mouse - rotate the camera
  • R - restart level
  • Esc - pause
  • Alt+F4 - exit

Assets:

  • cgtextures.com
  • orangefreesounds.com
  • soundcloud.com/ugotsta/sets/ambience/
  • Unity Standard Assets
  • my models and scripts
